info.jonclark.treegraft.chartparser
Class ActiveArcManager<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>

java.lang.Object
  info.jonclark.treegraft.chartparser.ActiveArcManager<R,T>
Type Parameters:
R -
T - 
public class ActiveArcManager<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token>
extends java.lang.Object

Handles extending arcs based on incoming keys and storing partially completed active arcs. All completed arcs are handed off to the Chart.

Author:
jon

add

public void add(ActiveArc<R,T> arc)
Adds an arc that has just been extended in some way. It is the caller's responsibility to ensure that any necessary backpointers are added to the ActiveArc.
